scope: In-depth SEO audit derived from codebase review (no live crawl or analytics data).
summary: The site rests on a strong Next.js foundation with extensive schema coverage, but requires consolidation of crawl directives, refreshed metadata strategy, structured internal linking, local citation alignment, and fresh performance data to unlock full organic visibility.

keyFindings.issue: Multiple robots/sitemap generation paths (next-sitemap, app/robots.ts, static files) risk conflicting directives.
keyFindings.recommendation: Retire redundant static files and standardise on a single generation source, verifying postbuild automation.

keyFindings.issue: Analytics and Search Console insights unavailable during the audit.
keyFindings.recommendation: Secure GA4 and GSC access to benchmark traffic, indexing, and CTR data for prioritisation.

keyFindings.issue: Template-driven titles/descriptions risk duplication and length overruns across similar pages.
keyFindings.recommendation: Crawl metadata outputs, enforce uniqueness, and incorporate length safeguards within content workflows.

keyFindings.issue: Body-copy internal links appear sparse when spot-checking templates.
keyFindings.recommendation: Adopt a guideline of five or more contextual links per priority page and audit for orphaned URLs.

keyFindings.issue: Canonical host/trailing slash enforcement is not explicitly defined at the edge.
keyFindings.recommendation: Implement 301 redirects via vercel.json or next.config.mjs to enforce the preferred canonical hostname and URL shape.

keyFindings.issue: Latest Core Web Vitals and Lighthouse scores are unknown.
keyFindings.recommendation: Run PageSpeed Insights/Lighthouse for representative templates and address LCP/CLS findings.

keyFindings.issue: Extensive schema exists but requires validation for completeness and error-free output.
keyFindings.recommendation: Validate key templates with Google’s Rich Results Test and add missing properties (geo, makesOffer, reviewedBy, etc.).

keyFindings.issue: External citation/NAP consistency could not be verified.
keyFindings.recommendation: Run a citation audit across major medical and local directories, correcting any discrepancies.

keyFindings.issue: Backlink portfolio quality and competitor benchmarks remain unknown.
keyFindings.recommendation: Use Ahrefs/Semrush to profile referring domains, identify gaps, and launch an authority-building plan.

limitations: No live crawling or log-based validation performed.
No access to Google Analytics or Google Search Console data.
Unable to query external SEO tools for backlinks, rankings, or keyword gaps.
Could not confirm production response headers or Core Web Vitals without live testing.

focus: Fix identified 404s and internal navigation breaks
Run PSI/Lighthouse audits on key templates
Refresh metadata and body copy with enhanced internal linking
Update E-E-A-T elements (bios, review dates, citations)
Expand unique location content and ensure full NAP/geo schema
Conduct backlink and competitor gap analysis
Pursue guest commentary and local PR opportunities
Integrate GA4/GSC data into reporting cadence
Establish ongoing CWV and crawl monitoring workflows

weekly: Check robots.txt/sitemap availability and critical 404 trends
Spot-check Lighthouse metrics for primary templates
Review GSC for new index coverage or enhancement alerts
monthly: Evaluate keyword rankings and GA engagement metrics
Audit GBP insights (views, calls, direction requests)
Run mini crawl to catch new broken links or redirect drift
quarterly: Audit backlink profile and citation consistency
Update keyword and content roadmap based on performance

nextSteps: Align stakeholders on impact/ease priorities and secure resources.
Execute robots/sitemap consolidation and canonical redirects ahead of broad content changes.
Schedule metadata, schema, and internal linking remediation sprints.
Obtain GA4/GSC and SEO tool access for data-informed iterations.
Re-test with live PSI/Lighthouse and crawl tools after each implementation wave.
